post:
Hello LET :)


We just launched a Winter Sale offer. Either on OVH / SYS

Until 30th January 3PM (Paris timezone, GMT+1)

-----------------------------------

**OVH offers**

**VPS:** Up to 25% off on several VPS, even new one hosted in Asia-pacific. **12 months commitment, not recurrent.**

**Dedicated servers:** Not compliant to LET rules (price with setup),  but you could be interested by some offers.
_**FYI:** Rise-LE are recurring offers, Rise-X / STOR-X aren't._

**Webhosting :** Up to 40% off. **Not recurrent.**

https://www.ovh.com

-----------------------------------

**So you Start offers**

Up to 40% off on 3 special SYS servers made for the event.

**Recurring offer, no setup fees if 6/12 months commitment**

https://www.soyoustart.com/ie/essential-servers/
https://www.soyoustart.com/us/


**SYS-WS-1**
Intel Xeon E5-1620v2 (4c / 8t - 3,7GHz / 3,9GHz)
32GB DDR3 ECC 1600Mhz (error on website which display 1333Mhz)
SoftRAID 2x2TB SATA
<del>49.99</del>
**€ 29.99 ex. VAT** (40% off)

Available in CA (Beauharnois) datacenter


**SYS-WS-2**
Intel Xeon E3-1245v2 (4c / 8t @ 3.4GHz / 3.8GHz)
32GB DDR3 1333Mhz
SoftRAID 2x4TB SATA
+SoftRAID 2x480GB SSD
<del>69.99</del>
**€ 49.99 ex. VAT **(28% off)

Available in FR / PL datacenters


**SYS-WS-3**
Intel Xeon E5-1620v2 (4c / 8t - 3,7GHz / 3,9GHz)
64GB DDR3 ECC 1600Mhz (error on website which display 1333Mhz)
SoftRAID 2x4TB SATA
<del>74.99</del>
**€ 56.99 ex. VAT** (23% off)

Available in CA (Beauharnois) datacenter

----------------------------------

Cheers
